DOC.brief_summary: Entecavir demonstrated superior virologic and biochemical benefits over lamivudine and adefovir. The investigators evaluated the effect of entecavir combined Hepatitis B immune globulin (HBIG) with lamivudine or adefovir or both combined HBIG in Chinese liver transplantation patients with Hepatitis B Virus (HBV) related diseases.
DOC.brief_title: Prophylaxis of Hepatitis B Virus Recurrence After Liver Transplantation
DOC.criteria: 1. patients into the transplant waiting list with HBVrelated liver disease. 2. No lamivudine, adefovir and entecavir drug allergy history. 7. no HBVYMDD mutation for patients who have a longterm use of lamivudine. 1. patients with HBVrelated hepatocellular carcinoma beyond Milan criteria. 2.
